column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=The night before I take a train ride , I look at the train schedule .
#id=2
#text=Usually I am going to New York City , so I check the train schedules for the trains heading there .
#id=3
#text=When my husband and I take the train , we go early , so that morning I wake up early and get ready for the day .
#id=4
#text=We then drive to the train station and park our car .
#id=5
#text=Depending on which train station we are going to , the parking is free , but otherwise we pay for our parking .
#id=6
#text=Once parked , we walk to the platform and buy our tickets at the automated teller .
#id=7
#text=Then we wait for the train to arrive .
#id=8
#text=When the train arrives , we find a good place to sit .
#id=9
#text=We try to sit where there are n't too many people and where there are only 2 seats so that we do n't have to sit with strangers .
#text=Then the train takes off and we usually are on the train for an hour before we get to our destination .
